Xiaoqian Shen

KAUST CS PhD
KAUST
xiaoqian.shen (at) kaust.edu.sa


About Me

I am currently a PhD student of Computer Science at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology supervised by Mohamed Elhoseiny. Before that, I received BSc in Computer Science from Jilin University, China.

Research Interests

  • Generative Models: Image Generation, Video Generation, Sequence Generation
  • Vision-Language: Multi-Modal Comprehension and Generation
